definition.text: The Relative Volume (RVOL) indicator calculates the projected volume using linear regression, and presents any deviation from the expected output as a potential entry point for a trade.

paragraphs.text: The calculated "Anomaly" value, if above the moving average value can be used as a potential entry point to a trade as it signifies extra volume is happening around the current level of price action.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| RVOL | rvol | volume, ma, anomaly |

The moving average length, and standard deviation thresholds of the indicator's calculations can be changed by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "RVOL" Procedure Loop.
